title: Java RMI (Remote Method Invocation) fromework with built-in SDP
description: RMI (Remote Method Invocation) framework provides service discovery out-of-box. client can discover server exposing predefined service interface with provided service discovery mechanism (based on mDNS-SD) within same network range. in this way, a number of IOT device, whose functionality itself is limited, can provide cooperatively more complex service.
